backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing admin‑controlled CRUD for pricing plans plus user profile storage with AccessControl authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend modifications: renaming CTA labels and updating the Talk to Sales button behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference mapping of frontend file paths to brief descriptions used for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root element and loading the main React module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/admin/PricingPla: Admin UI for creating, editing, and deleting pricing plans with validation and React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Footer with branding, navigation links, social links, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/landing/Header.t: Header with navigation, Internet Identity auth controls, admin access button, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/landing/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, animated reveal elements, CTA buttons, and feature icons using siteCopy content.
frontend/src/components/landing/ScrollRe: Scroll-triggered animation wrapper using IntersectionObserver to fade and slide elements into view.
frontend/src/components/landing/Sections: Landing page sections for stats, features, and pricing, each using siteCopy content, ScrollReveal animations, and optional backend pricing data.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Centralized static text and configuration for hero, navigation, stats, features, pricing, and FAQ content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication, with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for admin checks, user profiles, and CRUD operations on pricing plans via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, radii, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with react‑query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the full landing page layout and conditionally displays an admin panel based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radii, shadows, animations, and plugins based on CSS variable–driven theming.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, features, and current architectural notes for the Tripple Host site.
